resources.string: The Mailbox helps you to stay in touch with your contacts and synchronizes your messages to Briar.
Install the mailbox app on a spare phone or tablet and leave it connected to power and WiFi.
When your Mailbox is online, your contacts can leave messages for you even if your Briar is offline. The Mailbox will receive the messages, and forward them to Briar when you come online.
Messages going through the Mailbox are encrypted and cannot be read by the Mailbox or this phone. The Mailbox simply forwards them to your Briar Messenger phone.
